verses.verse: At <WG1722> that <WG1565> season <WG2540> Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076> heard <WG191> the report <WG189> concerning Jesus <WG2424>,

and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto <WG3816> his <WG846> servants <WG3816>, This <WG3778> is <WG2076> John <WG2491> the Baptist <WG910>; he <WG846> is risen <WG1453> from <WG575> the dead <WG3498>; and <WG2532> therefore <WG1223> do <WG5124> these powers <WG1754> work <WG1411> in <WG1722> him <WG846>.

For <WG1063> Herod <WG2264> had laid hold on <WG2902> John <WG2491>, and bound <WG1210> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> put <WG5087> him in <WG1722> prison <WG5438> for <WG1223> the sake <WG2266> of Herodias <WG846>, his brother <WG80> Philip <WG5376>'s wife <WG1135>.
For <WG1063> John <WG2491> said <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, It is <WG1832> not <WG3756> lawful <WG1832> for thee <WG4671> to have <WG2192> her <WG846>.

And <WG2532> when <WG2309> he <WG846> would have <WG2309> put him to death <WG615>, he feared <WG5399> the multitude <WG3793>, because <WG3754> they counted <WG2192> him <WG846> as <WG5613> a prophet <WG4396>.

But when <WG1161> Herod <WG2264>'s birthday <WG1077> came <WG71>, the daughter <WG2364> of Herodias <WG2266> danced <WG3738> in the <WG3319> midst <WG1722>, and <WG2532> pleased <WG700> Herod <WG2264>.
Whereupon <WG3606> he promised <WG3670> with <WG3326> an oath <WG3727> to give <WG1325> her <WG846> whatsoever <WG3739> she <WG1437> should ask <WG154>.

And <WG1161> she <WG4264>, being put forward by <WG5259> her <WG846> mother <WG3384>, saith <WG5346>, Give <WG1325> me <WG3427> here <WG5602> on <WG1909> a platter <WG4094> the head <WG2776> of John <WG2491> the Baptist <WG910>.

And <WG2532> the king <WG935> was grieved <WG3076>; but <WG1161> for <WG1223> the sake <WG3727> of his oaths <WG2532>, and of them that sat at meat <WG4873> with him <WG2753>, he commanded it to be given <WG1325>;
and <WG2532> he sent <WG3992> and beheaded <WG607> John <WG2491> in <WG1722> the prison <WG5438>.

And <WG2532> his <WG846> head <WG2776> was brought <WG5342> on <WG1909> a platter <WG4094>, and <WG2532> given <WG1325> to the damsel <WG2877>: and <WG2532> she brought <WG5342> it to <WG3384> her <WG846> mother <WG3384>.

And <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> came <WG4334>, and took up <WG142> the corpse <WG4983>, and <WG2532> buried <WG2290> him <WG846>; and <WG2532> they went <WG2064> and told <WG518> Jesus <WG2424>.

Now when <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> heard <WG191> it <WG402>, he withdrew from thence <WG1564> in <WG1722> a <WG2596> boat <WG4143>, to a <WG2596> desert <WG2048> place <WG5117> apart <WG2398>: and when <WG2532> the multitudes <WG3793> heard <WG191> thereof <WG190>, they followed him <WG846> on foot <WG3979> from the cities <WG4172>.

And <WG2532> he <WG2424> came forth <WG1831>, and saw <WG1492> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG3793>, and <WG2532> he had compassion <WG4697> on <WG1909> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> healed <WG2323> their <WG846> sick <WG732>.

And <WG1161> when even <WG3798> was <WG1096> come <WG846>, the disciples <WG3101> came <WG4334> to him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, The place <WG5117> is <WG2076> desert <WG2048>, and <WG2532> the time <WG5610> is <WG2076> already <WG2235> past <WG3928>; send <WG630> the multitudes <WG3793> away <WG630>, that <WG2443> they may <WG59> go <WG565> into <WG1519> the villages <WG2968>, and buy <WG59> themselves <WG1438> food <WG1033>.
But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, They <WG2192> have no <WG3756> need <WG5532> to go away <WG565>; give <WG1325> ye <WG5210> them <WG846> to eat <WG5315>.
And <WG1161> they say <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, We have <WG2192> here <WG5602> but <WG1487> five <WG4002> loaves <WG740>, and <WG2532> two <WG1417> fishes <WG2486>.
And he said <WG2036>, Bring <WG5342> them <WG846> hither <WG5602> to me <WG3427>.

And <WG2532> he commanded <WG2753> the multitudes <WG3793> to sit down <WG347> on <WG1909> the grass <WG5528>; and <WG2532> he took <WG2983> the <WG740> five <WG4002> loaves <WG740>, and <WG2532> the <WG740> two <WG1417> fishes <WG2486>, and looking up <WG308> to <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>, he blessed <WG2127>, and <WG2532> brake <WG2806> and gave <WG1325> the loaves <WG740> to <WG3101> the disciples <WG3101>, and <WG1161> the disciples <WG3101> to the multitudes <WG3793>.

And <WG2532> they all <WG3956> ate <WG5315>, and <WG2532> were filled <WG5526>: and <WG2532> they took up <WG142> that which remained <WG4052> over of the broken pieces <WG2801>, twelve <WG1427> baskets <WG2894> full <WG4134>.
And <WG1161> they that did eat <WG2068> were <WG2258> about <WG5616> five thousand <WG4000> men <WG435>, besides <WG5565> women <WG1135> and <WG2532> children <WG3813>.

And <WG2532> straightway <WG2112> he <WG2424> constrained <WG315> the <WG846> disciples <WG3101> to enter <WG1684> into <WG1519> the boat <WG4143>, and <WG2532> to go before <WG4254> him <WG846> unto <WG1519> the other side <WG4008>, till <WG2193> he <WG3739> should send <WG630> the multitudes <WG3793> away <WG630>.

And <WG2532> after he had sent <WG630> the multitudes <WG3793> away <WG630>, he went up <WG305> into <WG1519> the mountain <WG3735> apart <WG2398> to pray <WG4336>: and when <WG1161> even was <WG2258> come <WG1096>, he was <WG2258> there <WG1563> alone <WG3441>.

But <WG1161> the boat <WG4143> was <WG2258> now <WG2235> in the midst <WG3319> of the sea <WG2281>, distressed <WG928> by <WG5259> the waves <WG2949>; for <WG1063> the wind <WG417> was <WG2258> contrary <WG1727>.
And <WG1161> in the fourth <WG5067> watch <WG5438> of the night <WG3571> he <WG2424> came <WG565> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, walking <WG4043> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281>.

And when <WG2532> the disciples <WG3101> saw <WG1492> him <WG846> walking <WG4043> on <WG1909> the sea <WG2281>, they were troubled <WG5015>, saying <WG3754>, It is <WG2076> a ghost <WG5326>; and <WG2532> they cried out <WG2896> for <WG575> fear <WG5401>.
But <WG1161> straightway <WG2112> Jesus <WG2424> spake <WG2980> unto them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> Be of good cheer <WG2293>; it is <WG1510> I <WG1473>; be <WG5399> not <WG3361> afraid <WG5399>.

And <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> answered <WG611> him <WG846> and said <WG2036>, Lord <WG2962>, if <WG1487> it be <WG1488> thou <WG4771>, bid <WG2753> me <WG3165> come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> thee <WG4571> upon <WG1909> the waters <WG5204>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, Come <WG2064>. And <WG2532> Peter <WG4074> went down <WG2597> from <WG575> the boat <WG4143>, and walked <WG4043> upon <WG1909> the waters <WG5204> to come <WG2064> to <WG4314> Jesus <WG2424>.

But <WG1161> when he saw <WG991> the <WG2478> wind <WG417>, he was afraid <WG5399>; and <WG2532> beginning <WG756> to sink <WG2670>, he cried <WG2896> out <WG3004>, saying, Lord <WG2962>, save <WG4982> me <WG3165>.

And <WG1161> immediately <WG2112> Jesus <WG2424> stretched forth <WG1614> his hand <WG5495>, and took hold <WG1949> of him <WG846>, and <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, O thou of little faith <WG1519>, wherefore <WG5101> didst thou doubt <WG1365>?
And <WG2532> when they <WG846> were gone <WG1684> up into <WG1519> the boat <WG4143>, the wind <WG417> ceased <WG2869>.
And <WG1161> they that were <WG3588> in <WG1722> the boat <WG4143> worshipped <WG4352> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Of a truth <WG230> thou art <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>.
And <WG2532> when they had crossed over <WG1276>, they came <WG2064> to <WG1519> the land <WG1093>, unto Gennesaret <WG1082>.

And when <WG2532> the men <WG435> of <WG1921> that <WG1565> place <WG5117> knew <WG1921> him <WG846>, they sent into <WG1519> all <WG3650> that <WG1565> region round about <WG4066>, and <WG2532> brought <WG4374> unto him <WG846> all <WG3650> that were <WG2192> sick <WG2560>,

and <WG2532> they besought <WG3870> him <WG846> that <WG2443> they might <WG680> only <WG3440> touch <WG680> the border <WG2899> of his <WG846> garment <WG2440>: and <WG2532> as many as <WG3745> touched <WG680> were made whole <WG1295>.
